sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>v_user_session</collection> <condition>current.locked == true</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Kill User Session</name> <order>100</order> <priority/> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[// kill specific user session var session = GlideSessions.get().getSession(current.session_id).getHS(); session.setAttribute('locked_out', 'true'); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2007-09-20 21:59:58</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>24ee3bc30a0a0211009e08564fa5a56a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Kill User Session</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="User Session Management" source="com.glide.user_sessions">00a6f4643cb1311068bcf327dfe37fd2</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_24ee3bc30a0a0211009e08564fa5a56a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>tom.dilatush</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2009-09-30 22:19:06</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=24ee3bc30a0a0211009e08564fa5a56a"/> </record_update>
